items.title: Create Sample Form
items.description: Develop a basic sample form with standard input fields for demonstration purposes.
acceptance_criteria: Form includes at least one text input, one dropdown, and one submit button
Form can be submitted without errors
Form layout is responsive on desktop and mobile devices
All form fields have clear labels and placeholder text where applicable
Required fields display validation messages when left empty
Dropdown contains at least three selectable options
Submit button is disabled until all required fields are completed
Form submission triggers a confirmation message or page
Form passes accessibility checks (WCAG 2.1 AA compliance)
Form works correctly on latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge

notes: Requirement is vague; assumptions made about form fields, validation, accessibility, and purpose for demonstration.
